properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 2:17PM EST until January 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet expected. Total ice accumulations
of a trace to a few hundredths of an inch before temperatures
warm above freezing late Friday morning.

* WHERE...Lewis county.

* WHEN...From 5 AM to 10 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Periods of freezing rain will result in slick roads. Slow down
and use caution while driving.

Submit ice reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY
